applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR APPROVAL AND ALLOCATION OF COSTS IN ELECTRONIC PROCUREMENT

abstract.p: A system, method and computer program product for approval and allocation of costs in electronic procurement is described, wherein approval and allocation of costs are made in response to an electronic invoice, which includes information used to allocate procurement costs to one or more cost centers.
